text:
Vanessa had to pile on 20lbs for her role in 2013 film Gimme Shelter. But in a bid to shape up the 28-year-old turned to twice-daily fitness classes.

Revealing all in an interview with Women’s Health, the High School Musical babe said she routinely attended SoulCycle.

She explained: “Put me on a bike in a room with loud music, and I’m happy. It’s like dancing without the stress of worrying if you look good.

“I’m really competitive when it comes to fitness. I like being around people so I can compete.”
title: Vanessa Hudgens lost 20lbs by doing THIS twice a day
